content.question: A temperate grassland biome has a gross primary productivity of <math alttext="3,480 kilocalories per square meter per year" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>480</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>kilocalories/</mtext><msup><mrow><mtext>meter</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>/</mo><mtext>year</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> and a net primary productivity of <math alttext="2,000 kilocalories per square meter per year" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>000</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>kilocalories/</mtext><msup><mrow><mtext>meter</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>/</mo><mtext>year</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following is the approximate number of <math alttext="kilocalories per square meter per year" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>kilocalories/</mtext><msup><mrow><mtext>meter</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>/</mo><mtext>year</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> available to herbivores in that biome?

choices.label: <math alttext="200 kilocalories per square meter per year" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>200</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>kilocalories/</mtext><msup><mrow><mtext>meter</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>/</mo><mtext>year</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="1,480 kilocalories per square meter per year" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>480</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>kilocalories/</mtext><msup><mrow><mtext>meter</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>/</mo><mtext>year</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="2,000 kilocalories per square meter per year" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>000</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>kilocalories/</mtext><msup><mrow><mtext>meter</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>/</mo><mtext>year</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="5,480 kilocalories per square meter per year" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>480</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>kilocalories/</mtext><msup><mrow><mtext>meter</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>/</mo><mtext>year</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="200 kilocalories per square meter per year" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>200</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>kilocalories/</mtext><msup><mrow><mtext>meter</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>/</mo><mtext>year</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 6.C: Calculate an accurate numeric answer with appropriate units.
